Package org.cyclops.everlastingabilities.ability

Class AbilityHelpers

java.lang.Object
org.cyclops.everlastingabilities.ability.AbilityHelpers
public class AbilityHelpers extends Object
General ability helpers. XP-related methods inspired by Ender IO's XpUtil and the Minecraft Wiki

  • Field Details

    • maxPlayerAbilitiesClient

      public static int maxPlayerAbilitiesClient
      This value is synced with GeneralConfig.maxPlayerAbilities from the server. This is to ensure that clients can not hack around the ability limit.

    • addPlayerAbility

      @NonNull public static @NonNull Ability addPlayerAbility(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, Ability ability, boolean doAdd, boolean modifyXp)
      Add the given ability.
      Parameters:
      player - The player.
      ability - The ability.
      doAdd - If the addition should actually be done.
      modifyXp - Whether to require player to have enough XP before adding
      Returns:
      The ability part that was added.

    • removePlayerAbility

      @NonNull public static @NonNull Ability removePlayerAbility(net.minecraft.world.entity.player.Player player, Ability ability, boolean doRemove, boolean modifyXp)
      Remove the given ability.
      Parameters:
      player - The player.
      ability - The ability.
      doRemove - If the removal should actually be done.
      modifyXp - Whether to refund XP cost of ability
      Returns:
      The ability part that was removed.
